metadata.title: Yoga Wellness | Traditional Yoga for Holistic Health
metadata.description: Certified yoga teacher specializing in Traditional Yoga, Prenatal & Postnatal Yoga, and holistic wellness.

footer.tagline: Traditional Yoga for Holistic Wellness. Nurturing mind, body, and spirit through authentic practices.

home.heroSubtitle: Nurturing the mind, body, and spirit through authentic yoga practices. Personalized guidance for practitioners at every stage of life, including expecting and new parents.
home.welcomeP1: I am a certified yoga teacher with a deep commitment to sharing the traditional practices that have transformed my own life. My teaching is grounded in classical yoga philosophy while being adapted to meet the unique needs of each individual.
home.welcomeP2: Whether you are seeking to deepen your yoga practice, preparing for parenthood, or recovering from childbirth, I offer a safe and supportive space for your journey. Every class is taught with attention to proper alignment, breath awareness, and the individual needs of each student.
home.offeringsSubtitle: Thoughtfully designed yoga programs to support you through different phases of life.
home.traditionalYogaDesc: Authentic yoga practices rooted in ancient wisdom. Build strength, flexibility, and inner peace through time-honored techniques adapted for modern life.
home.prenatalYogaDesc: Safe, nurturing practices designed specifically for expecting parents. Support the changing body and prepare for birth with gentle, mindful movement.
home.postnatalYogaDesc: Restore and rebuild after childbirth. Gentle practices to help new parents regain strength, release tension, and find moments of calm.
home.readySubtitle: Take the first step towards a more balanced, peaceful life. I would love to hear from you and discuss how yoga can support your personal wellness journey.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A journey of self-discovery through the ancient wisdom of yoga.
about.journeyP1: My path to yoga began as a search for balance in a demanding world. What started as a physical practice quickly evolved into a profound journey of self-discovery and inner transformation. The ancient teachings of yoga offered me not just physical wellness, but a framework for living with intention, awareness, and peace.
about.journeyP2: Over the years, I have dedicated myself to studying with respected teachers, immersing myself in traditional yoga philosophy, and understanding the subtle aspects of this practice. My training has taken me through comprehensive teacher training programs, specialized prenatal and postnatal certifications, and continuous learning in the art and science of yoga.
about.philosophyP1: My teaching is rooted in the traditional foundations of yoga, honoring its rich heritage while making it accessible and relevant for contemporary life. I believe that yoga is for every body, and I create a welcoming space where students of all levels can explore their practice with curiosity and compassion.
about.inMyClasses: In my classes, you will find:
about.alignmentDesc: Clear, thoughtful instruction to help you practice safely and effectively.
about.breathDesc: Integration of pranayama to deepen your connection between body and mind.
about.mindfulDesc: A pace that allows you to truly experience each pose and transition.
about.individualDesc: Modifications and variations to meet you where you are today.
about.philosophyP2: I approach teaching with humility, recognizing that each student brings their own wisdom and experience to the mat. My role is to guide and support, creating conditions for you to discover the benefits of yoga in your own way and time.
about.traditionalYogaFocusDesc: Classical yoga practices including asana, pranayama, and meditation for overall wellness and spiritual growth.
about.prenatalYogaFocusDesc: Specialized practices to support expecting parents through each trimester, preparing body and mind for birth.
about.postnatalYogaFocusDesc: Gentle restoration practices for new parents to rebuild strength and find balance in the postpartum period.
about.holisticWellnessDesc: Comprehensive practices addressing the unique needs of individuals through different life stages and transitions.
about.ctaText: I would be honored to support you on your yoga journey.

offerings.title: Offerings
offerings.subtitle: Thoughtfully designed yoga programs to support you through different phases of life.

traditional.title: Traditional Yoga
traditional.description: Rooted in classical yoga philosophy, these sessions offer a comprehensive practice that integrates physical postures, breath work, and meditation.
traditional.detail1: Suitable for all levels, from beginners to experienced practitioners
traditional.detail2: Focus on proper alignment and safe progression
traditional.detail5: Understanding of yoga philosophy for daily life
traditional.ideal: Anyone seeking a grounded, authentic yoga practice that addresses physical, mental, and spiritual well-being.

prenatal.title: Prenatal Yoga
prenatal.description: Specially designed practices to support expecting parents through the beautiful journey of pregnancy. Each session is adapted to honor the changes happening in the body.
prenatal.detail2: Focus on building strength for labor and delivery
prenatal.detail3: Techniques to manage common pregnancy discomforts
prenatal.detail4: Breathing practices for relaxation and birth preparation
prenatal.ideal: Expecting parents at any stage of pregnancy who have medical clearance to exercise.

postnatal.title: Postnatal Yoga
postnatal.description: Gentle, restorative practices to help new parents recover from birth and navigate the demands of early parenthood with greater ease and presence.
postnatal.detail1: Gradual rebuilding of core strength and stability
postnatal.detail2: Practices to address postpartum body changes
postnatal.detail3: Relief for neck, shoulder, and back tension from feeding and carrying
postnatal.detail5: Self-care practices that fit into busy schedules
postnatal.detail6: Space to process the emotional journey of new parenthood
postnatal.ideal: New parents who have received clearance from their healthcare provider to resume exercise.

offerings.approachP1: All sessions are taught with attention to the individual. I believe in meeting students where they are, offering modifications and variations to ensure the practice serves each person's unique needs and goals.
offerings.approachP2: Classes emphasize safety, proper alignment, and the integration of breath with movement. Whether you are new to yoga or have an established practice, you will find a supportive environment to explore and grow.
offerings.readySubtitle: I would love to discuss which offering might be the best fit for you and answer any questions you may have.

prenatal.title: Prenatal Yoga
prenatal.subtitle: Safe, nurturing practices to support you through the beautiful journey of pregnancy.
prenatal.disclaimerText: The practices and information provided here are educational in nature and should be done under proper guidance with medical clearance from your healthcare provider. Every pregnancy is unique. Please consult with your doctor or midwife before beginning or continuing any exercise program during pregnancy.
prenatal.introP1: Prenatal yoga offers a safe way to stay active, connect with your changing body, and prepare for the journey of birth. Each session is thoughtfully adapted to honor the unique needs of your trimester.
prenatal.introP2: From gentle stretches to breathing techniques, these practices support both physical comfort and mental calm throughout your pregnancy journey.
prenatal.galleryNote: Photos of recommended prenatal yoga poses will be added soon.
prenatal.gentleDesc: Every pose is modified for pregnancy with your safety and comfort as the priority.
prenatal.trimesterDesc: Practices evolve with your pregnancy, honoring each stage of your journey.
prenatal.breathRelaxDesc: Learn breathing techniques to manage discomfort and prepare for labor.
prenatal.personalDesc: Individual attention to address your specific needs and concerns.
prenatal.ctaText: Ready to experience the benefits of prenatal yoga? Get in touch to discuss a practice suited to your pregnancy journey.

certifications.title: Certifications & Training
certifications.subtitle: A commitment to continuous learning and authentic yoga education.
certifications.intro: I believe that teaching yoga is a profound responsibility. To honor this role, I have pursued comprehensive training from respected institutions and teachers. My education combines traditional yoga wisdom with modern understanding of anatomy and holistic health, allowing me to offer safe, informed, and authentic guidance to my students.

cert1.title: 200 Hours Traditional Yoga TTC
cert1.description: Comprehensive teacher training in classical yoga, covering asana, pranayama, meditation, philosophy, anatomy, and teaching methodology. Foundation for teaching authentic, traditional yoga practices.

cert2.title: 300 Hours Yoga Teacher Training
cert2.description: Advanced teacher training building upon foundational knowledge with deeper exploration of yoga philosophy, advanced asana, therapeutic applications, and refined teaching skills.

cert3.title: Prenatal & Postnatal Yoga TTC
cert3.description: Specialized training in teaching yoga to expecting and new parents. Covers pregnancy anatomy, trimester-specific modifications, safe practices, and supporting individuals through the journey of parenthood.

cert4.title: Infant Massage & Breastfeeding Workshop
cert4.description: Training in infant massage techniques and breastfeeding support to help new parents bond with their babies and navigate the early postpartum period with confidence.

cert5.title: Garbhasanskara Workshop
cert5.description: Traditional Indian practices for pregnancy wellness, including mantras, meditation, and lifestyle guidance to nurture both parent and baby during pregnancy.

certifications.continuingText: Learning in yoga is a lifelong journey. Beyond formal certifications, I continue to study with teachers, attend workshops, and deepen my personal practice. This ongoing education ensures that I bring fresh perspective and refined skills to my teaching.
certifications.safetyDesc: Every practice is taught with attention to safe alignment and appropriate modifications.
certifications.authenticDesc: Instruction rooted in traditional yoga wisdom and verified by formal education.
certifications.compassionDesc: A supportive, non-judgmental space where every student is welcomed and valued.
